BIOEFFECT Body Intensive Age Defying Body Serum replenishes, softens and hydrates the skin and targets specific body concerns such as dryness and uneven skin tone for a boost of youthful radiance.
Formulated with BIOEFFECT’s highly acclaimed EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor); a substance which occurs naturally in human skin and has the ability to increase the rate of cell turnover within the skin. While the skin is young, it produces enough of its own EGF to maintain its youthful radiance. As we age, the skin slows its natural production of EGF and begins to lose firmness and elasticity. Fine lines appear and the surface epidermis becomes duller in appearance. Over time the amount of collagen and elastin in the skin‘s dermal layers dwindles, the skin grows thinner and wrinkles begin to form. By applying Body Intensive Age Defying Body Serum to the skin, it is possible to stimulate the natural process of cell renewal and minimise the visible effect of skin ageing.
This deeply nourishing body serum improves the skins tone and texture and has a firming effect on the body. Ideal for areas of the body which often lose firmness and elasticity through ageing such as the bust, arms, legs and décolleté, Body Intensive Age Defying Body Serum also combats dryness and rough skin.
Body Intensive Age Defying Body Serum adds a youthful radiance and luminosity to the skin and reverses the ageing process of cellular activators which causes skin to renew itself less frequently and begin to wrinkle. Other signs associated with ageing such as dullness, dry spots and uneven pigmentation begin to show dramatic improvements within days of initial use.
Suitable for all skin types, Body Intensive Age Defying Body Serum leaves the skin fully hydrated and silky soft with a noticeable improvement in tone, suppleness, texture and firmness.
